text: api banū isrāīlvarun va muhuda taraṇaya kerevvemu. eviṭa firavun hā ohugē sēnāva sīmāva ikmavamin hā saturukamin ovun pasupasa ham̆bā giyōya. avasānayē gilī yāma ohu va grahaṇaya kaḷa viṭa ‘sæbævinma banū isrāīlvaru kavareku piḷiban̆da viśvāsa kaḷē da ohu hæra venat deviyeku nomæti bava mama viśvāsa kaḷemi. tavada mama avanata vannan aturin keneku vemi’ yæyi ohu pævasuvēya
